mapper.insert: insert into uo_qywx_push_list( text_content, push_status, source_code, source_id, follow_user_id, insert_dt, mp_media_id, mp_appid, mp_title, mp_url, external_contact_ids) values(#{textContent}, 'P', 'DAILY', #{sourceId}, #{followUserId}, now(), #{mpMediaId}, #{mpAppid}, #{mpTitle}, #{mpUrl}, #{externalContactIds})
mapper.update: update uo_qywx_push_list set push_status = #{status}, msgid = #{msgId}, push_date = now(), fail_list = #{faildList}, remark=#{remark} where push_id=#{pushId}

mapper.select: select CONVERT_SPU_RATE, CONVERT_RATE, CONVERT_SPU_NUM, CONVERT_NUM, to_char(CONVERSION_DATE, 'yyyymmdd') CONVERSION_DATE_STR from UO_QYWX_DAILY_STATIS where HEAD_ID = #{headId} order by CONVERSION_DATE asc

select t.user_id, --用户ID t.follow_user_id, t.qywx_contract_id, t2.follow_user_name, t2.qywx_contact_name, t.path_active, --活跃度 t.user_value, --用户价值 t.push_date, --推送日期 t.conversion_date convert_date, --转化日期 round((extract(day from t.conversion_date::timestamp-t.push_date::timestamp) * 24 + extract(hour from t.conversion_date::timestamp-t.push_date::timestamp))::numeric/24::numeric, 1)::varchar CONVERT_INTERVAL, --转换间隔 t.spu_consistent, --推荐SPU与购买SPU是否一致 Y表示是 N表示否 t.rec_spu_name PUSH_SPU, --推荐SPU名称 t.IS_CONVERSION IS_CONVERT, t.SPU_CONSISTENT SPU_IS_CONVERT --转化的SPU名称 from UO_QYWX_DAILY_CONVERT_DETAIL t left join ( select uo_qywx_external_user_list.follow_user_id, uo_qywx_external_user_list.external_userid, uo_qywx_follower_user_list.name follow_user_name, uo_qywx_external_user_list.name qywx_contact_name from uo_qywx_external_user_list join uo_qywx_follower_user_list on uo_qywx_external_user_list.follow_user_id=uo_qywx_follower_user_list.user_id ) t2 on t.follow_user_id= t2.follow_user_id and t.qywx_contract_id=t2.external_userid where t.daily_header_id=#{headId} and t.IS_CONVERSION = '1' order by t.daily_detail_id asc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select count(1) from UO_QYWX_DAILY_CONVERT_DETAIL t where t.daily_header_id=#{headId} and t.IS_CONVERSION = '1'
